plot: While Michael and Jan go to their first Dunder Mifflin outing as an official couple, the office workers left behind go out for happy hour. During happy hour, Roy finds out that Jim and Pam kissed on Casino Night.

Michael, Dwight, Jim, Karen, and Jan all go to the Dunder Mifflin CFO's party. While there, Michael and Jan make their relationship public. Meanwhile, the rest of the office goes to Poor Richard's. Pam wants to get back together with Roy, but when he finds out about Pam and Jim's kiss, he gets very aggressive.—James Hake
